## UseTracksHookReturnType type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type UseTracksHookReturnType<T> = T extends Track.Source[]
  ? TrackReference[]
  : T extends TrackSourceWithOptions[]
  ? TrackReferenceOrPlaceholder[]
  : never;
```
